data.title: BWA Technology Net Viewer CCTV system software Technical Specifications
data.text:
Additional info The Net Viewer software module allows continuous and simultaneously real-time monitoring from several video and audio sources. Simultaneous support of up to nine cameras or DVRs. Selectable single, quad or multi channels display. Access to network DVRs via IP address or domain name. Identification of recorder name, name of video and audio channels.

Display remote data in video field, such as time/date, alarm and data rate. Direct assignment of GPS data to customised maps or Google maps. Automatic authorisation at server level with password-protected access. FPS adjustment to the bandwidth, automatic re-connection. Status display of motion-controlled local recording for each channel.
